Customer Relations Officer (Hausa) Job at Recruiters Village




        
    

        
        The Recruiters Village is a recruitment firm and we are recruiting to fill the position below:

Job Position: Customer Relations Officer (Hausa)

Job Location: Ikeja, Lagos
Employment Type: Full-time

About the Role


	We are seeking dynamic and customer-focused individuals to join our team as Customer Relations Officers.
	As the first point of contact for our valued clients, you will play a vital role in delivering exceptional service, resolving inquiries, and marketing the bank product while ensuring a seamless banking experience.


Key Responsibilities
     

        



     (adsbygoogle = window.adsbygoogle || []).push({});
    
    




	Provide prompt and courteous assistance to customers across various channels (in-person, phone, email)
	Handle account inquiries, complaints, and service requests professionally
	Promote bank products and services tailored to customer needs
	Maintain accurate records of customer interactions and transactions
	Collaborate with internal departments to resolve issues efficiently
	Uphold the bank’s reputation through excellent service delivery.


Requirements


	Minimum qualification: OND,
	Previous experience in customer service or banking is a plus.
	Age: Not more than 23 years
	Strong communication and interpersonal skills
	Customer-centric mindset with problem-solving abilities
	Basic computer literacy and familiarity with banking systems (an advantage).


What We Offer


	Competitive salary and benefits
	Salary Expectation : N112,000 monthly net and other incentives
	Structured career growth and training opportunities
	Supportive and inclusive work environment
	Opportunity to work with a leading financial institution.
